name: ILive
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Immerse yourself in the world of electronic creatures.

A game in the classic platformer genre, with elements of survival. Interesting style of decoration locations. You have to avoid collisions with aggressive robots androidiki that will come across you all the way. Which will follow you, shoot, gnaw! you are harmless ifonia, go through hard-to-reach places, where danger can also be hidden. These merciless robots will want to kill you and start hunting you. So try to stay away from them. The game has many different levels, a huge number of different obstacles that you have to go through. Good luck!

Features:
-achievements;
- Pleasant graphics;
-simple management;
-interesting gameplay;
- light music;
- unforgettable adventures;
